entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
